text: Franz Jung (2018) Franz Jung (born 1966 in Mannheim) is a German Roman Catholic bishop. == Life == Jung studied Roman Catholic theology and philosophy at Ducal Georgianum in Munich and at Pontifical Gregorian University in Rome. On October 10, 1992 he became priest. Since June 10, 2018 Jung is bishop of Roman Catholic Diocese of Würzburg.
